property.name: Rules
property.value: {BAD ACTION DYNAMITE} 2 (You may reduce this creature's summon cost by 2. If you do, destroy this creature at the end of the turn.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature is destroyed while it's tapped, take an extra turn after this one. ■ While battling, this creature gets +5000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks you, if you have no shields and you have a light and nature card in your mana zone, you may put this creature from your hand. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, draw a card. Then you may put a creature that costs 4 or less or a tamaseed that costs 4 or less from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, search your deck. You may take a non-creature card that costs 6 or less, show that card to your opponent, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck, then use that card from your hand for no cost.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all your shields into your hand. (You can use the "shield trigger" abilities of those shields.) {DOUBLE BREAKER}
